name: Kabsa
short_description: Savor the rich flavors of Kabsa, a beloved Gulf dish featuring tender chicken or lamb, fragrant basmati rice, and aromatic spices. Its Persian and Indian influences create a delightful, hearty meal.

name: Luqaimat
short_description: Indulge in golden, crispy bites of sweet pastry, deep-fried to perfection and drizzled with syrup or honey. Originating from the UAE, Luqaimat embodies the spirit of celebration and hospitality.

name: Saloona
short_description: A beloved staple in UAE households, Saloona features tender chicken simmered with vibrant vegetables and aromatic spices. Its hearty, comforting flavors make it a perfect everyday meal.

name: Balaleet
short_description: A beloved breakfast in the UAE, balaleet features sweet vermicelli infused with fragrant cardamom and saffron, topped with buttery scrambled eggs for a delightful sweet-savory experience.

name: Stuffed dates (Tamr mahshi)
short_description: Pitted dates are generously stuffed with a luscious blend of clotted cream, nuts, and candied fruit, creating a delightful Middle Eastern treat. Often enjoyed with tea, these festive bites celebrate the rich flavors of the UAE.

name: Khanfaroosh
short_description: A beloved treat in the Gulf, Khanfaroosh features a delightful blend of wheat and rice flour, eggs, and sugar, deep-fried to golden perfection. Its light, airy texture and subtle sweetness make it a must-try indulgence.

name: Stuffed Camel
short_description: A grand Bedouin tradition, this wedding dish features a whole camel stuffed with tender chickens, lamb, and eggs, slow-cooked to perfection, offering a rich blend of flavors and cultural heritage.

name: Ma'amoul
short_description: Delicate and crumbly, these traditional Emirati cookies feature a rich filling of walnuts, nestled in a buttery semolina dough. A beloved treat during festive occasions, they embody Middle Eastern hospitality.

name: Sago Halawa
short_description: Delight in the creamy richness of this Qatari pudding, where sago pearls blend seamlessly with ghee and sugar. Infused with aromatic cardamom and saffron, itâ€™s a fragrant treat often garnished with crunchy walnuts.
